comments.author: Patrick B.
comments.content: Is green garlic the same as garlic scapes?

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: No, garlic scapes are solid stem that I believe grows up out of the middle of the scallion-y looking part. The flavor is similar but the texture is different. They would also be good in this potato salad, you'd just want to saute them a bit longer to soften.

comments.author: Vegan
comments.content: Would really love to try this! Do you have any Vegenaise recipe?

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: I haven't made vegan mayonnaise myself, but I've seen it done on videos - it is pretty simple. You just need something other than egg to act as the emulsifier to keep the oil and water (lemon juice, whatever) together.
